{"id":917542987,"question_id":2664,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"11 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1679154214,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"237 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/917542987/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximize Greatness of an Array","memory":"101.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maximizeGreatness(vector<int>& nums) {\n        map<int, int> m;\n        for(auto i: nums) m[i]++;\n        int ans = 0;\n        vector<int> match, matched;\n        int p1 = 0, p2 = 1;\n        for(auto [k, v]: m) matched.push_back(v);\n        match = matched;\n        int m1 = 0, m2 = 1;\n        while(m2 < m.size()){\n            int tmp = min(matched[m2], match[m1]);\n            ans += tmp;\n            match[m1] -= tmp, matched[m2] -= tmp;\n            if(match[m1] == 0) m1++;\n            if(matched[m2] == 0 || m1 == m2) m2++;\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximize-greatness-of-an-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
